episode.title: 30 Years of TidBITS
episode.rawTitle: 284: ‘30 Years of TidBITS’ With Adam Engst
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Adam Engst joins the show to celebrate 30 years of TidBITS — the only publication going strong today that started as a weekly HyperCard stack.
